name: Jewel Block Puzzle Legend Lite
description:
Fun and addictive, easy to learn game. Keep your mind bending and your fingers flying.

Drop blocks in order to create and destroy full lines on the screen both vertically and horizontally.
The more rows you eliminate at one time, the more score you will be granted.

Mind challenging puzzle world
Use science of strategy and tactics
Easy to play, and pleasurable game for all ages!
Enjoy game any time, anywhere
No time limit
Leaderboard and Best score screen sharing features

Play Now and Enjoy!
